typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		SouthridgeMovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		actors as string,
		title as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		runtime as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> source1
